title: BENICIA 3/Bedroom 2/Bathroom, Southampton Single level Home
posting_body: Single Story Home located Southampton Road and Chelsea Hills:
3 Bedroom, 2 bath, 2 car garage, "Bonus" Large Additional Family Room with vaulted ceiling.
Formal living room with fireplace, open floor plan, kitchen, Master bedroom, carpet throughout home, laundry in garage w/d hookups.
Rear yard is private with room to roam.
Front and Back Yard (Patio) - Low maintenance.
Tenant pays all utilities, Access to Southampton Swimming Club.
Close to schools, shopping, restaurants and freeways Hwy 680/780/80.
